content:
Hello!
I have a couple of questions regarding denied/reversed item or services on ClaimResponse resources
Is there a way to indicate (at a line item level) whether an item or service was denied and the reason behind that decision - different processing policies, etc.
The claim itself can be an original but different line items can be denied.
I am thinking of two options:

  1. Creating ClaimResponse for each line item and using outcome and disposition elements to indicate the status of the item
  2. Creating a ClaimResponse for all of the items and using the item.adjudication.reasonCode to indicate why that particular item/service was denied.

Thank you!
@Katerina Nikolova - you might get some input from the folks on the #Da Vinci PAS channel since their efforts deal with the Claim/ClaimResponse workflow.
